item.description: A Reflection on My NUS Journey

item.title: Lim Hong Wei
item.description: Email: l_hongwei@u.nus.edu GitHub: https://github.com/imhongw LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/hongwei-lim/ WWW: https://imhongw.github.io Education National University of Singapore ASEAN Scholarship Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Engineering), 2015 - present Bachelor of Social Sciences (Economics), 2015 - present (expected to graduate fall of 2019) University Scholars Programme (USP), 2015 - present Experience Auk Industries, Singapore Systems Engineer Intern Jan 2018 - present A Singapore based start up that implements performance tracking of manufacturing machines through plug-and-play ready, edge IOT devices, that will allow users to execute important business decisions.
